amendment.description: To provide that $500,000 may be used for completion of design and initiation of construction of the McCarran Ranch, Nevada, environmental restoration project

vote.text: Amendment SA 1688 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1688 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11539; text: CR S11539) To provide that $500,000 may be used for completion of design and initiation of construction of the McCarran Ranch, Nevada, environmental restoration project
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1688 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1688 proposed by Senator Reid.
